Back to Domenico Scarlatti

Domenico Scarlatti

Sonata in F major, K. 78

? · Fadini 40 · Longo 75 · Pestelli 26

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 2' 30"

  • 1. Gigha: Allegro
  • 2. Minuet

This sonata was likely written for solo instrument and continuo, but can still be played effectively by keyboard alone.

Recommended editions

  • Editio Musica Budapest · Z. 7817 · 200 Sonate per clavicembalo (pianoforte) / Parte prima · ed. György Balla
  • Le Pupitre (Heugel) · LP. 32 · Sonates / Volume II · ed. Kenneth Gilbert
  • Ricordi · ER 2749 · Sonate per clavicembalo / 1 · ed. Emilia Fadini

1. Gigha: Allegro

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

2. Minuet

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1
